description: Enterprise techniques used by Kasidet, ATT&CK software S0088 v1.1
name: Kasidet (S0088)

techniques.comment: [Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) creates a Registry Run key to establish persistence.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)(Citation: Microsoft Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) can execute commands using cmd.exe.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to search for a given filename on a victim.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to change firewall settings to allow a plug-in to be downloaded.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to download and execute additional files.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to initiate keylogging.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to search for a given process name in processes currently running in the system.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to initiate keylogging and screen captures.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to identify any anti-virus installed on the infected system.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
[Kasidet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0088) has the ability to obtain a victim's system name and operating system version.(Citation: Zscaler Kasidet)
